text: Hey ! Welcome to this Pre-Alpha. The chief asked for you, did you talked to him ?

dialog.text: Are you blind %T ? He's just next to Gurlgill few steps east of here !

choices.choice: What the hell is this game !? Need help !

dialog.text: It's simple but you gotta use your imagination : Circles are friends, squares are enemies. You have spells inside the middle-bottom bar but you have to target something to cast harmful spells! The menu is on the bottom-left corner. That's it, GL, and enjoy.
